title: Let’s Enjoy Fresh Fish!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Hanayo-chaaan! Over here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Kanan-san, thanks for inviting me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Welcome to Numazu~! Hanayo-chan, let me show you just how amazing Numazu’s fish are!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I’ve been looking forward to it ever since I heard about it! Where are we going now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>We’re gonna head to a restaurant that serves fish that was caught just this morning.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Awesome~~~! I’ve looked this place up before, and this is the restaurant that serves a bunch of unique specialties, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yup! They serve sashimi can only be made here because of how freshly caught the fish need to be, and deep-sea fish can only be eaten here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>W-wow! This is so exciting~~! Let’s go now, Kanan-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Are you sure? I thought you just had breakfast. Don’t you want to go for a little walk along the beach first?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I only had one onigiri! I can eat right now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
